title: Please jesus help me
body:
So I pick a name for my In game name, the name is available. I click "Yes" to go through with it, but no dice. It won't take me any further, pressing yes does literally nothing, but if I click no it allows me to type my name.

My question is, why won't it let me just go through with the name and start playing?

replies.body:
Are you applying your Summoner Name through the updated client?  There may be an issue preventing you from creating it through there.  Instead, head back to the legacy client through the login screen.  You'll find an option to return to legacy client under the Sign In button.  
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg


Let me know if this is the case for you, so we can keep an eye on it.
Most likely because they are doing the end of season rewards and preparing for season 7. They even stopped account transfers but those could be apart of the same thing when they disabled transfers.
